metadata.title: Enjoybuy Mens Denim Bib Overall Shorts Above Knee Length Rompers Walk Dungaree Jumpsuit Relaxed Fit
features: These casual overall shorts for men are made of ultra soft cotton blend fabric. Comfortable and cool to wear, perfect for summer!
This over knee length short features a classic regular fit, Raw Hem, cotton stretch twill material and solid color.
Simple design summer shorts for men, easily to pair with a t shirt underneath. Perfect for tropical area and vacation!
4 colors in stock, Pink, Grey, Black and Khaki. The color may slightly different from what it appears on the websites, due to different monitor settings.
For more new arrival fashion clothings or shoes, please click "Enjoybuy" above the title to enter our store. Any questions, please contact us at any time!
description: Bib Overall Shorts, Cotton Blend, Sleeveless, Front and Side Pockets.
Hand Wash/Machine Wash. Do not Bleach. Non High Temperature Ironing. Avoid Over Exposure.
Please allow 1-3cm differs due to the manual measurement. The color will also be a slightly varied in different display.
It'll be highly appreciated for leaving a positive review if you're satisfied with our products or service.
The package ships by international shipping carrier, it normally takes around 10-15 days to arrive.
Feel free to contact us if you have any questions before ordering or after receiving the products, we'll be glad to help!
